administrative_burden_reduction.name: Administrative Burden Reduction

responses_by_question.What stakeholders are involved?: Strategic Tech Leadership, Revenue Cycle Leadership, Clinical Informatics Leadership, Health System Pharmacy Leadership, Patient Access Leadership, Compliance/Security
responses_by_question.What tasks do they work on as part of th: Trigger recognition and problem sizing for Administrative Burden Reduction. Triggers: FTE vacancy spikes; burnout survey signals; productivity mandates; rising overtime/contract labor spend. Baseline current-state workflow performance and quantify impact.
responses_by_question.What are the key questions they have?: What changed and why now for Administrative Burden Reduction? Which service lines/meds are most impacted? What is the cost of delay, denial, leakage, or labor?
responses_by_question.What information and/or support do they: Internal analytics (denial/appeal rates, PA turnaround time, abandonment/drop-off, time-to-start), staffing/labor metrics, and qualitative feedback from providers/patients.
responses_by_question.How will we help customers with their al: Validate with a current-state assessment: trend analysis, root-cause workshops, and peer benchmarks; align on 2–4 enterprise KPIs.

responses_by_question.What stakeholders are involved?: Strategic Tech Leadership, Revenue Cycle Leadership, Clinical Informatics Leadership, Health System Pharmacy Leadership, Patient Access Leadership, Compliance/Security
responses_by_question.What tasks do they work on as part of th: Explore approaches for Administrative Burden Reduction: optimize EHR-native workflows, expand payer connectivity/automation, improve specialty enrollment/visibility, centralize work, or combine.
responses_by_question.What are the key questions they have?: What patterns reduce manual work, increase predictability, and scale enterprise-wide? What can be standardized vs requires local flexibility?
responses_by_question.What information and/or support do they: Solution landscape overview, demos, reference architectures, integration options (Epic/Oracle/etc.), security posture, implementation timelines.
responses_by_question.How will we help customers with their al: Validate via short-listed demos + workflow walk-throughs using real cases; build a proof-of-value hypothesis tied to KPIs.

responses_by_question.What stakeholders are involved?: Strategic Tech Leadership, Revenue Cycle Leadership, Clinical Informatics Leadership, Health System Pharmacy Leadership, Patient Access Leadership, Compliance/Security
responses_by_question.What tasks do they work on as part of th: Define requirements for Administrative Burden Reduction: functional workflows, technical integration, operational model, governance, and measurement (KPIs).
responses_by_question.What are the key questions they have?: Which criteria are mandatory? What is required for compliance/security? What delivers fastest measurable value?
responses_by_question.What information and/or support do they: Prioritized requirements (must/should/could), integration/data needs, reporting, audit/compliance controls, and change-management plan.
responses_by_question.How will we help customers with their al: Validate with a weighted rubric and use-case testing scripts; confirm data availability/ownership; confirm resourcing model.

responses_by_question.What stakeholders are involved?: Strategic Tech Leadership, Revenue Cycle Leadership, Clinical Informatics Leadership, Health System Pharmacy Leadership, Patient Access Leadership, Compliance/Security
responses_by_question.What tasks do they work on as part of th: Compare vendor options and internal build/extend options; evaluate fit, risk, and ability to execute at scale; run reference checks.
responses_by_question.What are the key questions they have?: Can we implement without disrupting clinical workflows? Can the vendor meet security/audit needs? Can it scale across facilities/service lines?
responses_by_question.What information and/or support do they: Demo/RFP scores, security questionnaires, implementation plans, total cost estimates, reference interviews, and pilot design.
responses_by_question.How will we help customers with their al: Validate with a limited-scope pilot plan and a business case including risks, mitigations, and KPI targets.

responses_by_question.What stakeholders are involved?: Strategic Tech Leadership, Revenue Cycle Leadership, Clinical Informatics Leadership, Health System Pharmacy Leadership, Patient Access Leadership, Compliance/Security
responses_by_question.What tasks do they work on as part of th: Negotiate terms, finalize contracting, confirm implementation plan, and launch change-management communications.
responses_by_question.What are the key questions they have?: What is total cost of ownership? What is timeline to value? What are downside risks and contingency plans?
responses_by_question.What information and/or support do they: Final contract/SOW, implementation roadmap, data-sharing agreements, KPI reporting cadence, and governance model.
responses_by_question.How will we help customers with their al: Validate with success measurement plan and quarterly executive reviews; confirm training/adoption and support model.

administrative_burden_reduction.notes: Dummy data derived from CSV; replace later with validated buyer-journey research.

problem_identification.name: Problem Identification
problem_identification.decision_intent: Establish that a meaningful, urgent problem exists and define scope and impact.
problem_identification.demand_gen_objective: Create awareness, credibility, and internal alignment signals; motivate exploration.

solution_exploration.name: Solution Exploration
solution_exploration.decision_intent: Explore solution patterns and approaches; compare possible paths forward at a high level.
solution_exploration.demand_gen_objective: Educate on solution approaches and differentiation without forcing a vendor decision.

requirements_building.name: Requirements Building
requirements_building.decision_intent: Define requirements, constraints, and evaluation criteria across stakeholders.
requirements_building.demand_gen_objective: Support consensus building with checklists, frameworks, and proof themes.

vendor_selection.name: Vendor Selection
vendor_selection.decision_intent: Shortlist, validate, and de-risk vendor options prior to procurement.
vendor_selection.demand_gen_objective: Mostly sales-led; demand gen supports with credibility assets and proof packaging.

purchase.name: Purchase
purchase.decision_intent: Finalize contracting, implementation planning, and internal change-management commitments.
purchase.demand_gen_objective: Mostly sales/customer success-led; demand gen supports with onboarding/change narratives.

replacement_notes: This KB is populated with dummy buyer-journey content for MVP testing.
Replace initiatives[].stages and any narrative fields with validated research when available.
Keep IDs stable to avoid breaking downstream mappings.
